linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04 or later, or otherwise compatible Linux distribution.
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)

name: Endings Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Finnish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
